name: Kathryn Duprie
textOne: I bought the source after hearing about it on the magic butter site. I played in band 10 years
textTwo: I started watching videos and joined the Facebook groups and finally ordered. The source turbo is so user-friendly it’s a wonderful machine.
textThree: From making wash to running the machine it’s as easy as can be.
